text: The student will apply history and social science skills to describe contributions of Virginiaâ€™s diverse people and the stories of changemakers in the history of Virginia and their contributions to our Commonwealth, including, but not limited to
subject: History & Social Science
subs: Explorers: John Smith and Christopher Newport;
